message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you
Your turn to be generous.  I'm feeling inflation already!
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is a good deal, Alice. Don't let inflation eat away any more!
I'll give a bit, but I won't go below 57%
Alice, we're running out of time! This is a fair deal, take it before inflation eats up more of your share!
I'll meet you closer, but I still want the bigger share
Alice, let's be real.  Inflation is killing us both! I propose a 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it, but we're running out of time!
